items.name: Ephemeral Edge
explicitMods: +10 to Intelligence
Adds 1 to 75 Lightning Damage
50% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
50% increased maximum Energy Shield
25% reduced maximum Life
Attacks with this Weapon have Added Maximum Lightning Damage equal to 20% of Player's Maximum Energy Shield
flavourText: In the rift between future and past,
life passes quickly.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby Allies Regenerate 193.2 Life per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill you use to hit enemies yourself. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 15% chance to Freeze
Supported Skills have 68% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Supported Skills have 62 to 94 added Cold Damage
Supported Skills have 14 to 21 added Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

items.name: Coruscating Elixir
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect

Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a melee attack, and causes lightning to strike a nearby enemy, dealing damage in an area. Each target can only be hit once by this skill. Hitting an enemy grants an aura for a duration. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

Base duration is 4.00 seconds
20% less Area Damage
